metadata.title: Housing Minister Pirzada extends Eid greetings to nation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 7 (APP): Federal Minister for Housing and Works, Riaz Hussain Pirzada extended heartfelt greetings to the nation on the joyous occasion of Eid-ul-Azha. In his special message on the occasion of Eid, the minister conveyed a message of love and unity, emphasizing the importance of national solidarity. Riaz Hussain Pirzada prayed for Pakistan's sovereignty and protection, expressing his hope for a prosperous and harmonious future. The minister also urged political parties to set aside their differences and work collectively for the country's progress. The minister also paid tribute to Pakistan Army over the recent great victory against India. "Pakistan is my identity. I love my homeland and will work tirelessly to serve my nation," he affirmed. He concluded his message with warm Eid wishes, saying, "Eid Mubarak to the entire nation."
